thread.title: Microsoft: Xbox One's Future Is Focused on Gamers
thread.title_full: Microsoft: Xbox One's Future Is Focused on Gamers - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft: Xbox One's Future Is Focused on Gamers
text: Phil Spencer, who leads the Xbox One division at Microsoft, has been recently accused by some fans of the home console that he is prematurely accepting that his platform will not be able to get ahead of the rival PlayStation 4 when it comes to overall sales. The executive has taken to Twitter in order to dispel any such notions and to make clear that his team was focused on delivering the best possible experience for gamers rather than on competing with the Sony platform. ... Â»
